Text: You can send your feedback and comments regarding englification to author's channel here: you2be / user / Keytotruth
Ofcourse, since the englification is based on japanese version of the game it is compatible with your japanese savegames.
Just thought Id leave a post. Got it working and so far, Im impressed both with the game and the translation.

what are the other games that has unofficial and partial englification / english translation?

gah! my psp 1000 just shuts down when i try to load this game >_

@kangir, To get mine to work (Ive got a slim myself and phat for the wife) I had to enable just the KHBBS_patch.prx, not the other two. also they had to be running 5.50 GEN-D3, ISO emulation set to sony np9660 and disabling most every other prx (in game.txt)
how did you find this out? i'm really curious what are those other games that have a translation. i was really surprised.
Uploaded modified version of the game that doesn't require plugins: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5609918/[PSP]Kingdom_Hearts__Birth_by_Sleep[ENG_][FULL][FIX](pluginless)
